title: Bitcoin ‘Permabull’ Max Keiser: ‘El Salvador Will Be Debt Free by 2030 With Bitcoin’
description: Max Keiser, international journalist and chairman of mining company Volcano Energy, has pondered on the importance bitcoin adoption will have for El Salvador in the future. title: Experts Encourage Accumulation of Altcoins Ahead of Bitcoin Halving
description:
Prominent figures in the crypto space, such as Michaël van de Poppe and Lark Davis, have taken to Twitter to share their insights on the upcoming Bitcoin (BTC) halving and its potential impact on the market. Both experts emphasized the importance of accumulating altcoins during the current period of low interest in the markets, highlighting […]
